original_text: The word that came to Jeremiah concerning all the people of Judah in the fourth year of Jehoiakim the son of Josiah king of Judah, that was the first year of Nebuchadrezzar king of Babylon;
korean_text: 유다의 왕 요시야의 아들 여호야김 넷째 해 곧 바벨론의 왕 느부갓네살 원년에 유다의 모든 백성에 관한 말씀이 예레미야에게 임하니라

sentences.original_text: The word that came to Jeremiah
concerning all the people of Judah
in the fourth year of Jehoiakim
the son of Josiah king of Judah
that was the first year of Nebuchadrezzar
